description:
Shawn is back to get a blow job.
He wasn't the typical "nervous first timer" and it was fun to work with someone who was anticipating a relaxing blow job, rather than worrying about it.
I can't decide which is better- his front side, or his backside! He's got the most perfect ass! He really got in to having it eaten, so maybe one day we can get him to put sumfin' in there.
Until then, enjoy his blow job, and hopefully we can see him in full-on action soon!
title: Bryan & Shawn - Serviced
